data.text/markdown: This set of formulae calculate a variety of vertical gross upward pricing prices index (VGUPPI) values. Notation: U, D, and R are companies that make things. U: Upstream supplier that makes an input to D and R's product D: Downstream producer R: Downstream rival U and D form a single entity by vertical merger.

console.name: stdout
console.text:
=== VGUPPI Calculations ===

Elasticity variables:
  e_p:  0.250000
  e_sd: 1.750000
  e_sr: 1.750000

VGUPPI - Upstream (U):
  vguppi_U: 0.088889

VGUPPI - Rival (R):
  vguppi_R: 0.020494

VGUPPI - Downstream (D):
  vguppi_D1 (no EDM, no substitution): 0.062500
  vguppi_D2 (with EDM, no substitution): -0.187500
  vguppi_D3 (with EDM and substitution): -0.406250
